comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content:
In 1961 it was still the Tanganyika Broadcasting Corporation. 
The Rt. Hon. Iain Macleod, MP, was the British Secretary of State for the Colonies, who was visitng Dar es Salaam for the Constitutional Conference, held in the Karimjee Hall,on 27 March 1961, to finalise the form of Tanganyika's Independence constitution and decide the date for Independence.
